short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open a separate window to scribble

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scribbler is a lightweight Chrome extension designed for freehand drawing on a responsive canvas directly within a popup window. With features like dynamic canvas resizing, freehand drawing, and an easy-to-use "Clear" button, Scribbler makes it simple to doodle or take quick visual notes on the go  works on touch devices also supports keyboard shortcuts.
